mapper.insert: insert into video_grade(grade_id, user_id, course_id, chapter_index, lesson_index, grade_score, grade_time) values (null, #{user_id}, #{course_id}, #{chapter_index}, #{lesson_index}, #{grade_score}, #{grade_time});
mapper.select: select * from video_grade where course_id = #{course_id} and user_id = #{user_id};
select sum(grade_score) from video_grade where user_id = #{user_id} and course_id = #{course_id} and chapter_index = #{chapter_index};
